name: apply(batchSize:inputA:inputB:inputC:output:)
desc: Applies the layer to a set of input array descriptors, writing the result to a set of output array descriptors.
declaration: func apply(batchSize: Int, inputA: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, inputB: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, inputC: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, output: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor) throws
